m_szDocTitle: Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Declines Today on Higher Quarterly Loss Expectations - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Declines Today on Higher Quarterly Loss Expectations By Tony Owusu | 04/14/15 - 01:14 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) shares are down 1.09% to $206.92 in afternoon trading on Tuesday after analysts at Morgan Stanley ( MS ) lowered their earnings forecast for the electric vehicle manufacturer today. Morgan Stanley analyst Adam Jonas, who has previously written consistently bullish notes on the company, said that he now expects the company to report a non-GAAP net loss of 77 cents per share versus the consensus estim
